org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Class MeterContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks.ChartContext
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.MeterContext

  • public final class MeterContext
extends ChartContext
    The callback context wrapper, created and passed by MeterOptions which contains the link to the native chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double easing 
      private double value 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MeterContext(BaseContext baseContext)
      Creates a context getting the native object from BaseContext which is storing chart and type properties in order to be able to extend the ChartContext.
